kernfrasen: brilliant new thread has made its appearance in the fabric
runs here and there throughout the subsequent portions
warp, if not also the woof, of the entire New Testament tapestry
invasion from a sphere other than this one
do battle with this present evil age
weighed in the balances and found wanting
vindicate the loyalty of his servants

metafoor_inventaris.metafoor_expressie: Apocalypsis... means invasion from a sphere other than this one.

cognitieve_implicaties: The hearer perceives God as an external, disruptive force rather than a natural progression of history.
theologische_implicaties: Grace is sovereign and 'wholly other'; it does not emerge from human culture.
ethische_implicaties: The believer must choose sides in a cosmic conflict.
onbedoelde_consequenties: God may be perceived as a violent aggressor or an alien threat to human agency.

metafoor_inventaris.vitaliteit_toelichting: Re-activates the Greek etymology by stripping away 'End Times' clichés and replacing them with the concrete image of a physical breach.

coherentie_analyse.coherentie_verklaring: The preacher successfully links the textile metaphor (continuity of scripture) with the invasion metaphor (discontinuity of revelation) by framing the 'thread' as the record of God's 'invasions'.

incoherentie_punten.conflict_beschrijving: A fabric implies a slow, integrated construction; an invasion implies a sudden, external destruction of the existing order.

succesvolle_blending.blending_strategie: The 'opened eyes' (Vision) allow the believer to 'do battle' (Warfare) in the 'dark' (Environment).

sterktes.beschrijving: Reclaims the 'dead' metaphor of 'Apocalypse' from pop-culture 'End of the World' imagery to 'Unveiling/Invasion'.
sterktes.voorbeeld: The apocalypse of God comes to us with life-transforming force.

risicos.beschrijving: The use of 'invasion' and 'battle' language, while theologically grounded, can inadvertently baptize militaristic mindsets.
risicos.voorbeeld: invasion from a sphere other than this one
risicos.potentiele_impact: Congregation may adopt a 'siege mentality' against the secular world.

text_world_analyse.primaire_wereld: The Hellenistic World (164 B.C.) as a mirror of 1980s America.

deictic_shifts.effectiviteit: High; bridges the historical gap through shared economic status symbols.

versterkte_schemas.hoe_versterkt: Through the 'Handwriting on the Wall' as an unstoppable judicial decree.

verstoorde_schemas.verstoring_strategie: Contrasting the 'unaided eye' of political pundits with 'apocalyptic transvision'.
verstoorde_schemas.vervangend_schema: The Kingdom of God as an 'everlasting dominion' that exists regardless of election results.

schema_analyse.liturgische_schema_aansluiting: Fits the radical hospitality and resistance schema of the Catholic Worker movement.

aanbevelingen.metafoor_audit_samenvatting: The sermon is dominated by metaphors of Vision and Conflict. It effectively uses 'Apocalyptic' as a lens rather than a timeline. The landscape is one of 'transvision'—seeing through the surface of political power to the underlying divine reality.

revitalisatie_suggesties.suggestie: Deepen the source domain by describing the tension and friction of the loom.
revitalisatie_suggesties.voorbeeld: The thread doesn't just run; it pulls the fabric tight, creating a tension that the world tries to rip apart.

coherentie_verbeteringen.resolutie_strategie: Explicitly frame the 'invasion' as occurring *through* the weakness of the lowly, rather than as a separate military-style force.

entailment_checks.problematisch_entailment: God is a puzzle-maker who only speaks to 'experts'.
entailment_checks.aanbeveling: Emphasize that Daniel's ability comes from 'faithfulness in small things' (character) rather than 'secret knowledge' (gnosticism).

alternatieve_domeinen.rationale: To ground the 'bulwark' metaphor in the physical reality of the Maryhouse building.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: A masterclass in using CMT to deconstruct cultural assimilation and reconstruct a radical theological identity.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_esthetiek: While an aesthetic analysis would praise the 'tapestry' imagery for its beauty, CMT reveals it as a cognitive map for biblical continuity.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_kolb: Unlike Kolb's focus on the 'four types of learners', CMT focuses on how the 'Invasion' metaphor physically re-wires the hearer's perception of agency.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_CMT: Reveals that the preacher uses 'Vision' not as a synonym for 'Idea', but as a 'Container' for a new reality (Transvision).

appendices.notities: Sermon delivered in a specific political context (1980 Election) which heightens the 'Military/Conflict' domain.
